snippet: Kasper Konig, a Berlin curator who has defended art against censorship by conservatives, has been named chief curator of the 10th edition of Manifesta, the roving European contemporary art biennial.
abstract: Kasper Konig, Berlin curator who has defended art against censorship by conservatives, has been named chief curator of 10th edition of Manifesta, roving European contemporary art biennial.
lead_paragraph: Kasper Konig, a Berlin curator who has defended art against censorship by conservatives, has been named chief curator of the 10th edition of Manifesta, the roving European contemporary art biennial.
